/>
VIII.i.3.C.9.a
.
Definition: Birth Defect
A
birth defect
is an abnormality of
structure
function, or
metabolism.
The abnormality may be
genetically determined, or
a result of environmental influence during embryonic or fetal life.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
